item.title: CVE-2024-32697|2024-04-22T07:55:00.660Z -- helloasso -- helloasso
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HelloAsso allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HelloAsso: from n/a through 1.1.5.
